item.title: USD 9 Trillion in Assets Commit to ADGM as Abu Dhabi Finance Week Redefines Global Capital Flows
item.author: FN FinanzNachrichten.de
item.description: ABU DHABI, UAE, Dec. 18, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- ADGM, the international financial centre of Abu Dhabi, is entering its second decade with strengthened momentum, as it announces the addition of 11 new major global financial institutions representing more than USD 9 trillion in assets under management. ...
